name: CreateEnvironmentExports
description:
Initiates the creation of environment exports in Datadog.

Use this tool to initiate the creation of environment export files for a specific project in Datadog. This is useful for backing up or transferring project environment settings.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project for which you want to create environment exports. Use /api/projects/ to find the ID.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: environment_export_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for the export, including `id`, `dashboard`, `insight`, `export_format`, etc.

export_format.description:
* `image/png` - image/png
* `application/pdf` - application/pdf
* `text/csv` - text/csv
* `application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet` - application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet
* `video/webm` - video/webm
* `video/mp4` - video/mp4
* `image/gif` - image/gif
* `application/json` - application/json
